attributes.about:
TechFork catering is a catering/ food services provider company and is based out of Bangalore. They have been in the wedding catering business for quite some years now and they leave no stone unturned to provide you and your guests the best meal on your wedding day. They are high on experience and try to provide maximum customer satisfaction by witnessing a smile on the clientâ€™s face. TechFork catering offers customised menus for any type of party/event and wedding at a reasonable pricing.
They can prepare a menu of food according to your choice and for any number of people ranging from 30 to 3000. Be it any pre-wedding function with minimal gathering or your final wedding function with a large number of guests they can help you with all. They can serve up to 3000 guests and have been a customer's delight for their exclusive cuisines cooked and served with excellent hygiene practices.
** Style of work**
They are very easy to work with and have built a relationship of trust with their customers in addition to providing a variety of options and timely services. TechFork Catering understands the importance of your big special day and keeps in mind that there can be no compromises when it comes to the taste of food at your wedding. They make delicious dishes with a pinch of innovation and with a lot of dedication.
They love what their job is and it is to keep people happy by providing them lip-smacking dishes. They keep the hygiene in the process of making food on top priority and keeps it as a prime focused objective. The team of TechFork catering has a very supportive and friendly staff and is very professional at the same time when it comes to punctuality.
**
